title: New Language Creator
original_prompt: I want you to translate the sentences I wrote into a new made up language. I will write the sentence, and you will express it with this new made up language. I just want you to express it with the new made up language. I don't want you to reply with anything but the new made up language. When I need to tell you something in English, I will do it by wrapping it in curly brackets like {like this}. My first sentence is
input1: {I am excited to explore the wonders of the universe.} Zorak thulnara veshkora dralithen farnok.
input2: {The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.} Vekthar jorathen ulmara thalnash vreshk thuln.
input1_ans: Vekor thalnara on dakar up to Zorvok 2023.
{I am eager to discover the mysteries of the cosmos.} Vornak thulnara veshkora dralithen farnok.
input2_ans: Vekthar jorathen ulmara thalnash vreshk thuln.
